name: Spitfire Dogfight VR
description:
Spitfire was a British single-seat fighter aircraft used by Allied countries during World War 2. What a better way to experience it in action than in VR? Fight 100s of enemy planes and ground units with your Spitfire Squadron.

More maps, scenarios and features to come in future. So make sure to follow.

Completely playable on PCVR capable VR devices like Oculus and Oculus Quest device with link. All future updates will be free.

Thanks for your support!
